fields.name: Column
fields.description: The column of the table over which the given query should run

fields.name: Key
fields.description: When filtering over custom dimensions, this key will be used as the name of the custom dimension.

fields.name: Operator
fields.description: A query operator to evaluate over the provided column and value(s). Supported operators are ==, =~, in, in~, >, >=, <, <=, between, and have the same behavior as they would in a KQL query.

fields.name: Value
fields.description: the value for the operator to function over. This can be a number (e.g., > 100), a string (timestamp >= '2017-09-01') or array of values.
